description:
This course will teach you how to prepare an amortization schedule for a loan. You will also learn how to jump into an amortization schedule at any point in time.

You will be provided with a workbook which includes the examples that will be discussed during the video lectures. You can use the completed workbook as your reference.

The course will take you about 2-3 hours to complete although this time will vary among different students.
title: 8. Amortization Schedules
